title: This assignment tests you on how to use different loops to iterate the operations.

questions.questionText: Write a java program to convert the following code using while loop.

title: This assignment tests you on how to use different loops to iterate the operations.

questionText.text:
Given two numbers a and b, write a function that returns the gcd of those two numbers
gcd(4, 5) → 1
gcd(4, 20) → 4
gcd(10, 3) → 1

title: This assignment tests you on how to use different loops to iterate the operations.

questionText.text:
Write a function iterPower which takes base and exponent as arguments and return the value after calculating base raised to the power of the exponent.
iterPower(2, 3) → 8
iterPower(-5, 5) → -3125
iterPower(1, 100) → 1

title: This assignment tests you on how to use different loops to iterate the operations.

questionText.text:
Write a program to print the multiples of the given number n.
multiples(3) → [1, 3]
multiples(10) → [1, 2, 5, 10]
multiples(100) → [1, 2, 4, 5, 10, 20, 25, 50, 100]
